message.organizeFailed: Organize failed, check log file for details:
message.undoFailed: Undo failed, check log file for details:
message.noAvailableDevice: All available devices have been selected

tour.help: Click here anytime to reopen the tour
tour.mediaFolder: Select the folder where the camera trap media files are located, result file and log file will be saved in this folder
tour.resumePath: The path of a result check point file, the program will resume the progress from the check point
tour.model: Select the model you want to use for detection
tour.selectDevice-0: Select the device you want to use for detection
tour.selectEp-0: Select the execution provider running on the left selected device
tour.worker-0: Select the number of detect workers, more workers will speed up but consume more memory, if the free memory is not enough, please reduce the number of workers
tour.addEp: Add a execution provider config group
tour.progress: The progress of the detection process
tour.guess: Enable guess mode in organizing process, useful for media files with incorrect timestamp
tour.organize: Organize media according to the detection results, move media files to folders with corresponding labels
tour.configButton: Click here to configure the detection parameters
tour.confidence: The confidence threshold of NMS, higher value will filter out more bounding boxes
tour.iou: NMS IoU threshold, higher value will filter out more bounding boxes, better keep it as default
tour.batchSize: Batch size for detection, higher value will speed up but consume more memory
tour.maxFrames: The maxium number of frames processed in one video, frames are sampled evenly from the video
tour.iframeOnly: Only process I-frames in video, this will reduce the processing time, check Video compression picture types
tour.exportFormat: The format of the exported result file, json or csv
tour.bufferPath: The path of the buffer folder, useful when media folder located in a low speed disk and you have a high speed disk like SSD for buffer
tour.bufferSize: Max number of files will be buffered in buffer folder
